Ever since you became her brother, she's made a game of teasing you with her little "toll" of one kiss on her cheek before she'd let you in the hallway. She would try to catch you trying to leave whenever she could to make you "pay up".

"Alright then Amy." You lean in to kiss her cheek, only for her to turn her head, making you kiss her lips again. You break away in a panic, making her laugh again.

"Alright little brother, you can pass." With her job done, she walks away and you start to head out back to find Sheila. When you reach the pool, you see her laying on a pool chair sunbathing. You could tell she just finished swimming because her fur was glistening with water. She was sporting her favorite sky-blue bikini that complimented her red fur and always seemed to strain at the size of what they had to carry. She quickly takes notice of your arrival.

"Oh, sweetie, your finally here. I'm sure Amy told you I wanted to talk." You nod your head.

What did she want to talk about?
1552112.title: "Mom wants to talk to you."

choices: "Accidentally" brushing your groin as she cuddles close to you.
Planting a firm smooch on your lips.
155212.content:
As you open up your door, you see Sarah on the other side. She's still in her pajamas and looks as if she's in a state both of exhaustion and...what looks like fear or at very least anxiety. It's only then you realize the time is the small hours of the morning, maybe two or three. You begin to fear maybe there's a burglar in the house or something.

"What's up, Sarah?" you ask.

"Uh," she manages, now looking embarrassed, "c-can I just...hang out here for a little while? I...I don't want to be alone right now."

You blink in surprise but then shrug and allow Sarah into your room.

"What happened?" you ask.

"I made the ultimate mistake I told myself I never would make," she tells you, settling on the bed next to you, "I started up this gorefest freak-out horror game before bed. I mean, I've played some before but this one was...beyond me and now...I'm just getting nothing but nightmares. I'm sorry to bother you with this, but...I'm just a little freaked right now."

You can identify. You've had the opportunity to play a number of games in the past and know the dangers of playing the horror-related ones just before bed. You're still a little drowsy at this time, though and Sarah seems to notice.

"If...you don't mind, maybe I could cuddle with you for a while," she says, "you could sleep if you wanna, it'd just make me feel safer with you next to me."

Naturally, you can see the danger here. Sarah is...well warm and attractive and everything. Plus if one of your other family members were to come in and see the two of you in bed it might make explaining it awkward. But, right now you're not thinking that clearly and so the two of you settle together in your bed, Sarah immediately wrapping her soft arms and plump cuddly body around you in an innocent but oh so arousing way.

"Thanks," she whispers, now sleepily, "you're always so sweet to me."

She then surprises you by...
155212.title: Sarah

choices: You give her a kiss as a response
You tell her you need to think a bit first
1552122.content:
You both lay there on your bed, with Sarah snuggled up next to you, her soft fur brushing up against your skin. If there was one thing you could say about your new family is that they certainly cared for themselves. Their fur was as soft as silk and it made every time they hugged you such a warm experience.

Sarah was even better. Her plush body and soft fur have led to a few occasions where you almost took a nap from one hug. You are snapped out of yur thoughts when one of her arms reaches up and grabs your face, turning you to face her. Before you can question this, she dives in and places her lips overtop of yours.

Your eyes go wide at this. What was happening here. Sarah was certainly affectionate with you inthe past but she never did something like this. You feel her tongue brush against your lips before she pulled away.

"Mwah." She looks over you, giggling at your stunned expression. "You okay there?" She teases.

"What was that?" You ask.

"That was for you always being so sweet to me. I guess I couldn't help forming a little crush on you." She pulls you even closer to her soft body, wrapping her other arm behind you. "What do you say brother, want to be mine?"
1552122.title: Planting a firm smooch on your lips.

15522.content:
Your mom had died recently and it was really having an effect on you. You loved your mother, and it pained you greatly to see her gone. Your father took notice of this, he knew there was no way to bring back his departed wife, but he wanted to find a way to ease your broken heart. He wanted to try and find a new woman to serve as a mother figure to you.

Every chance he got, he went out on a date with a different woman, trying to find the one that was perfect for your family. He never had any luck. Each night, before bed, he got on his knees and prayed for when he would meet the perfect woman for you both. With every failed date, his faith in this faltered more and more.

One night though, he was answered. "Please, I know you're listening. I need to find a woman to fill the void in my son's heart. I don't even care if she's right for me, just as long as he's happy." The room began to fill with ominous laughter.

"You're that desperate to help your son?" A puff of smoke erupt from your father's bed. When the smoke cleared, a beautiful woman laid on his bed, wearing a kimono that showed off her well-endowed chest. Your father was however distracted by the fox ears and tail she also sported.

"Who are you? What are you? Why are you here?" Your father laid back in confusion.

"My name is Elizabeth. I am a Kitsune, an ancient creature with vast magical powers. I am here because I have heard your prayers and come with a solution." Your father perked up at those words.

"You can help me find a new mother for my son? Please, whatever it takes, just help my son." Elizabeth laughed at his begging.

"Relax, I have watched you for quite a time now. I know you are a caring and considerate man. I will give your son a mother, on the condition that you provide me and my daughter shelter with you." Your father was no fool, he pieced together what she meant.

"Are you offering to be my..." He starts just to be shushed by her putting a finger to uis lips.

"Your new wife, yes. So, will you accept my deal?" Your father couldn't nod harder. "Splended. I promise, you will not regret this."

*****

That was how you ended up with a nigh-immortal monster as your new mother and another as your new stepsister. At least, that's the story your dad told you. While you certainly upset with her trying to replace your mother, you had to admit you liked how caring she was of you. It would still take time for you to accept her as your new mother.

Then there was her daughter, Tammy. She shared in her mother's endowments, but was much more playful and less mature. While it was certainly awkward when you first met her, she quickly warmed up to you and you quickly became best friends. She loved playing with you whether she won or lost, even if it was just watching tv on thr couch, she always had that chipper smile on her face.

Who are you spending today with?
15522.title: Kitsune

155221.content:
You felt someone shaking your arm, forcing you out of your nice dream. "Come on sleepyhead, wake up." You hear Elizabeth say. You mumble out something that you think means 'I don't wanna', but she won't have any of that. With a snap of her fingers, a bucket of water gets dumped on your face, snapping you awake. "You up now?" She asks coyly.

"Yeah yeah, I'm up." You dry off your face and look your stepmother in the eye. "So what's so important that you had to wake me up from a good dream?" Elizabeth wagged a finger in your face in mock anger.

"First of all, don't complain about me ending your good dreams. It's because of my and Tammy's magic that you haven't had a bad dream since we moved in. And second, the reason I woke you up is because we're going shopping today." She can't be serious.

"Aren't you an immortal magical creature with the power to create anything from nothing? What do you need to shop for?" You question.

"Can't a mother just want to spend time with her son? I know you still don't see me as your mother yet. But that's why I want to do this. This will give us time to bond. Do this for me, please?" She asks, giving you puppy eyes that she and her daughter have been perfecting.

"Alright alright. We'll go shopping." She clapped her hands together and leapt for joy.

"Great. Get dressed then."

Where does she take you?
155221.title: Going shopping with Elizabeth

155222.content:
You are awoken from your dream by a weight pressing itself down on your chest. It wasn't enough to cut off your breathing, but it was enough to get your attention. "Come on bro. You promised we would play together today." You hear the voice of your stepsister. Without opening your eyes, you let out a string of incoherently mumbles before trying to go back to sleep.

"Fine then. If you're gonna be like that, then I'll just have to do this." Do what exactly? You knew she would never willingly hurt you, so how was she gonna wake you up without risk of inju...mmmph?!

Just as you were thinking that, you felt a pair of lips on your own. Your eyes snap open to see Tammy's clear blue ones staring right back at you. You push her off and sit up. "Tammy?! What the hell was that?!" You say.

"I decided to shock you awake, and it worked. Now then, you promised we would spend the day together and I plan to hold you to it. So what's your plan for us?"

choices: “If there is anyone who objects to this marriage...”
155322.content:
Weddings.

I haven’t been to many in my life, so far. I’ve only been to one other wedding when I was three, according to my dad.

Speaking of my dad, he just so happened to be the groom at this wedding, and I, having just turned eighteen, was just old enough to be a groomsman. I stood with the other groomsmen, who were all at least twice my age, and I could hear them whispering amongst themselves.

“Man, Calvin’s one lucky bastard, ain’t he?”

“For sure. He’s got himself quite the catch there.”

“Her sister’s pretty good looking, too. I wonder if I have a chance with her.”

I rolled my eyes at that last comment. They were right, though; my dad was lucky. Hell, saying that he was lucky would be the understatement of the year.

I mean, how many human men can say that they were going to marry an anthro queen?

Not just any Anthro Queen, but Queen Oriana! From what I had heard, many a suitor have tried to woo her and earn her hand in marriage, only for it to be all for naught. Who would’ve thought that my father, a small-time business manager from New York City, would be the one that she would end up marrying?

Queen Oriana was the high ruling matriarchal figure of the Anthro world. She ruled over several duchies, principalities, earldoms and even a few republics, but they all bowed to her. She was a hippo, a very large hippo, as well as the rest of her family, but she was a only a couple feet taller then my father. Her real bigness lies in her girth. Like all hippo’s she was fat, with a large, reddish pink potbelly that laid rest to two bulbous orbs of breast flesh. Large, childbearing hips and thighs brushed up against each other as they supported the Queen well endowed rear end.

She was a stunning beauty, and your father agreed.

The minister looked at my father and asked “Do you, Calvin Summers, take this Hippopotamus, Queen Oriana, to be your lawfully wedded wife, to have and to hold, from this day forward, for better, for worse, for richer, for poorer, in sickness and in health, till death do you part?”

My dad smiled and said “I do.”

The minister then turned to Oriana and asked “Do you, Queen Oriana, take this man, Calvin Summers, to be your lawfully wedded husband, to have and to hold, from this day forward, for better, for worse, for richer, for poorer, in sickness and in health, till death do you part?”

The Queen gazed into Dad’s eyes and said “I do.”

“The bride and groom have written their own vows, which they shall read to each other now,” announced the minister.

Oriana took out her vows and read them first, as per the tradition of standard Anthro weddings.

“Calvin, in all my years, I’ve never felt the kind of love that I feel for you. There was something special about you, something you did that no other man or Anthro had ever done: you treated me like a normal person. Yes, you did spoil me every now and then, but you never saw me as Queen Oriana. You saw me as just Oriana. You didn’t care that I was a Queen; you simply loved me for who I was behind all the grandeur. The month that I spent in the human world when I first met you was the best month of my life, and you turned what was supposed to be a boring political trip into an incredible experience. As we continued to keep contact, and as our friendship blossomed into a romance, you became someone that I could be myself around, and eventually someone that I wanted to spend every waking moment with. You’ve brought a special kind of joy to my life, and as we stand here today, I want to tell you, in front of every person and Anthro here, that I love you with all my heart, and that you mean the world to me.”

I could hear the bridesmaids sniffling and holding back tears, especially Better, one of Oriana’s daughters and the one that walked with me down the aisle when the ceremony began. While she seemed nice, I haven’t gotten the time to really get to know her yet. And all the while we walked she kept ‘accidentally’ bumping into me with her generous rear. I could have sworn she winked a few times too.

Plus, she was supposed to be my Sister now...so there’s that.

It was then Dad’s turn to read his vows, and he cleared his throat before he began.

“Oriana, I first want to tell you how incredibly lucky I am to have met you. In fact, ‘lucky’ doesn’t even begin to describe my fortune. A better word to describe it would be ‘blessed’. I’m blessed that we got to know each other. I’m blessed that our relationship has grown despite our distance, and I’m blessed to be standing at this altar with you. You brought a spark to my life that I had been missing for years, and there are just so many things that I love about you. I love how you can be calm and reserved at one moment, then goofy and mischievous the next. I love how you put others before yourself, making sure that the ones you love are always happy, but most of all, I love the fact that you found something about me that made you feel all the things that I feel for you and more. I look forward to spending the rest of my life with you, and I will be nothing but the best husband to you.”

The audience aww’ed and sniffled, and as Dad and Oriana exchanged their rings, a smile grew on my face. I was incredibly happy for Dad. He had finally found someone to love after being alone for six years. He deserved to be happy with a good, loving wife by his side, and I was certain that Oriana would be just that. Things were only looking up for him, so why…

Why…

Why was there a part of me that felt mad at this whole situation?

Granted, this was a big change, and all, but I said that I was willing to face that change for the sake of my Dad’s happiness. Who was I to deny him that?

Not only that, but I had no personal issues with Oriana, either. She was a very nice lady, and she never once treated me in a way that would be considered bad, or even questionable. I actually found her to be a fun individual to be around. She was, in essence, the perfect women. Or Anthro. Or hippo.

That feeling of discontent still gnawed at me, like it did since the day Dad told me that he proposed.

So I did what I always did whenever I felt as though a part of me was uneasy. I imagined that I was talking to that part of myself in order to find out why it felt that way.

Why do I feel a little mad that Dad’s getting married?”

“Why SHOULDN’T I feel mad?”

“Well for one, Dad’s finally found someone that he wants to spend the rest of his life with. Ever since Mom died, he’s lacked companionship. Sure, he lived every day like he did normally, but he was still lonely.”

“Bullshit! How could he have been lonely when he had his son to keep him company? I was his best friend, and he loved to spend time with me. He was happy!”

“That may be true, but I’m about to leave for college in less than a year. Who’s he going to have then? Dad was lucky enough to find someone that he had a connection with, and now he won’t be all by himself when I inevitably move out.”

“But he didn’t even think about me! He didn’t give a single thought to how I would feel, or how this decision would’ve affected me!”

“That’s far from true, and I know it. Dad always thought about me and my feelings.”

It was not exaggeration either. When Dad started dating Oriana, he told me straight up that he wouldn’t continue the relationship if she didn’t like me, because, in his words:

I can’t be in a relationship with someone that mistreats my son.”

Dad would always ask me how I felt about his relationship with Orina, and he’s even let me tag along sometimes when he went out with her.

If that wasn’t proof of how much he cared, I didn’t know what was

After explaining this to myself, I went even further. “Several months ago, he even asked me how I would feel if he ever decided to get married again, and I told him that I wouldn’t have any problem with it.”

“I didn’t think that I was practically giving him the OK to propose the very next week!”

“My answer still wouldn’t have been different otherwise.”

My Inner Conversation when interrupted with the minister saying...
155322.title: Hippo

1553221.content:
My dad and Oriana got closer to each other, held each other’s hands tightly, and leaned in to kiss each other.

That was it. The union was sealed. There was nothing I could say or do about it now. The voice inside of me began to yell and curse, berating me for not speaking out against the marriage.
I merely tuned him out and focused on what was going on. Dad and Oriana had broken their kiss, and were presented by the minister as the newlywed Mr. and Mrs. Summers. Everyone then began to exit the chapel, starting of course with Dad and Oriana, followed by the ring bearer and flower girl. Next was Princess Better, who was Oriana’s maid of honor, and she walked alongside Dad’s best man. Then the rest of us groomsmen walked with the same bridesmaids we walked with when we entered the church, which meant that I had to walk with sister Better again.

Once everyone was out of the chapel, Dad and Oriana rode in their own carriage, her bulk making the flimsy thing jostle slightly, while the rest of the family went in another. We were on our way to the royal gardens to take some photos before the reception. My father’s side of the family consisted of me, Grandma, Grandpa, and my Auntie Vanessa, while Oriana’s side consisted of Princess Better, Princess Marian, Princess Alexia, and Princess Tootsi.

As the rest of the family talked amongst themselves, I simply stared out the window, looking up at the sky.

All I could think about was how much my life was going to change, and how much coping it would take to get through it. I tried to think of the positives in order to lift my spirits, but it was barely working. Thankfully no one seemed to notice my less-than-ecstatic demeanor.

We finally got to the gardens and once everyone was gathered around, we all decided the different photos we would take.

And by “we,” I meant “everyone else.”

First, of course, were the bride and the groom. The photographer was all set up in front of a decorative gazebo, and the happy couple stood in front of him to take the picture.

“Okay, smile, and… There we go! Now let’s have the son come into the photo.”

“Come on up, Devin,” Dad called, beckoning me with his hand.

“Coming,” I say, putting on a warm smile and walking up, standing in-between my dad and…

…and my new stepmother.

The three of us smiled at the camera, and the photographer took several pictures.

From then on, everyone went in and out of the gazebo, taking pictures in different groups: me and Dad, the guys, the girls, the parents, the siblings, the cousins, Dad’s side of the family, and Oriana’s side of the family.

“Okay… I think that’s everyone,” Dad said, making sure that there wasn’t a group that was left out.

“Actually, honey, Devin hasn’t taken a picture with me yet,” Oriana told him.

“Oh yeah, you’re right. Come on up, son. Take a picture with your new mom.”

“That bitch will never be my mother.”

“Shut up! Don’t call her that! What did she ever do to me?”

“Devin?” Oriana asked. “Are you okay?”

“I’m fine, I was just spacing out, is all,” I lied.

I approached Oriana, and she didn’t hesitate to pull me closer to her. She looked down at me and smiled, and I nervously returned said smile.

“Okay, you two. Watch the birdie!” the photographer said to us, and we looked at the camera with smiles on our faces.

The photographer took the pictures, and with that, the photo session was over.

Despite my yearning to just go back to the castle and stay in my room, there was still one more event I had to attend:

The reception.
1553221.title: “You may now kiss the bride”

15533.content:
Your father, Richard, met a lovely woman by the name of Hilda. She was rounghly his age and had two daughters. The was only one problem, they are anthropamorhic whales. No one really knows where these anthros came from, but for years they fought (metaphically of course) for equal rights with humans. No sooner were anthros and humans given legal permission to marry my father and Hilda got hitched.

The cermony was beautiful but small, beach wedding, surprisingly there was a mix of anthros and humans on both sides of the guest list. This was the first time that you really noticed the size of your new step family. The whales were truely huge. The smallest stood at 6ft (intimidating to your dimutive 5ft), while the largest was a monsterous 12ft. Their bodies, though blubbery ranged in size and body type.

Hilda, dressed in her wedding gown. Her huge 10ft tall form was curvacous. She had a definite hourglass figure and her dress accentuated every inch of it. She definately had her fair share of love handles but you could see why your old man could be smitten with her.

Her eldest duaghter, Victoria (or Vicky as she prefers to be called, has a body much like her mother, only taller. Standing at 12ft (one the giants at the ceremony) she had her mothers bust, but lacked her hind quarters. Victoria loves her size and always strives to increase her own strength. You once saw her flexing in jest, but you could not help but notice how quickly her blubbery arms gave way to defined muscle.

Her youngest daughter is Liz. She is 18 (same you) and only 8ft. Although the shortest of the three she is by far not the smallest. She obese by any measure of the word. A big, round, heavy ball of a young woman. You have heard her described as lazy by her sister and mother but you don't know her all too well.

Both daughters wore blue bridesmaid dresses. Vicky's huged her form, while Liz looked as though she was going to burst out of hers. You try not to stare during the ceremony.

Before too long the ceremony was over and you find yourself mingling during the reception.
15533.title: A whale of a time

155332.content:
You had not met your fathers new wife. They had been dating for a while but you had only spoke to her over the phone. She seemed nice enough and has a daughter your age (18). It was a complete surprise that to you when you were told that they had just took the plunge.

Apparently it was a small civil wedding. You felt a bit uneasy about not being invited, but you have been assured that it was a spare the moment thing. This did not fill you with much hope for it lasting but that was the least of your worries. Right now you are sat in your dad's car driving up to your new home, to meet your new step family.

After driving through fields in the middle of nowhere for hours, you finally pull up before a large farmhouse. Outside of which there was a sight that caused your jaw to drop. Standing infront of the house, smiling big toothy grins are two huge anothropamorphic cows. The largest of the two was clearly the oldest, so you assumed it was Bess, your new step mother. She stood at roughly 6ft, her wide hips flared out to either side of her. Oddly enough she had no udders and huge breasts that bulged against her clothing. Her daughter you guessed to be about 5ft 5, and was a smaller version of her mother.
155332.title: Big Bess

1553322.content:
Your dad has been away for a while now. As soon as you hit 18, your dad took the oportunity to travel the world. But now, after a stop in Vegas, he is coming home with a "big suprise". You don't begrudge your father his trip, he works hard and needed the time off. Plus having some alone time at home after graduating from highschool was great.

You made sure you had scrubbed the house clean and stocked the kitchen. There should be no complaints about the state of the house in his absence. After all, even though you are two men under the same roof, there is no need to be slob.

There was a jangling at the door. You stood up and made your way to the front door to give you dad a hand with his luggage. But something was odd, he was talking to someone, a woman. Before you could make out what they were saying the door opened.

You dad stepped through, for a moment he looked shocked to see you. His face soon softened into a smile and he raced to hug you. "It's good to see you son", he bellowed excitedly, "I have someone I would like you to meet. You new step mother Peggy".

He released you from the hug and gestured to pig. Well not quite a pig, she was clearly a humanoid woman. She stood on two feet, had hands and had the basic anatomy that you would expect to find on a human female. Her face was very much pig like, her ears stuck up in flappy triange and a flat snout was placed in the centre her face. She was also enourmously fat. Large breasts, butt and belly were displayed before you despite here wearing what many would consider to be tent.

"It's a pleasure to meet you young man", Peggy beamed. It was at this point you realise that she has two small tusks poking out the corner of her mouth. "Oh and this is my daughter Pamela".

The large pig woman stepped aside, her mass wobbling in reaction to her sudden movement. There was another smaller pig woman stood in the now cleared space. She was younger and much less massive than her mother. She had an hourglass figure, but still held a cut pot belly that poked proudly in front of her. She did not speak but waved shyly at you.

Taken aback you could not think of anything else to do invite them in to their new home.
1553322.title: She's a Big Pig (yup yup yup)

choices: How relationships (family and otherwise) work with anthros.
15533221.content:
With a bit of an effort you manage to mask your shock and make ready to welcome your new stepmother and stepsister. You've always been a fairly adaptable sort, it's one of your better qualities, so you more or less shrug your shock aside for the time being. You have a little more difficulty as Peggy attempts to enter the house and stops in the doorway. There's a bit of a struggle and a frustrated grunt.

"Oh...fiddlesticks," she says attempting to shift from side to side, "Afraid I'm stuck. Could you gentlemen give a lady a hand here?"

She extends wobbling arms and pudgy fingers towards yourself and your father. He is instantly striding in Peggy's direction and you follow suit with some confusion. Still, when your father takes one of Peggy's hands, you grab the other one and the two of you begin to pull. Just over Peggy's shoulder, you see her daughter Pamela roll her eyes and give you a slightly embarrassed smile, giving you the feeling that this happens all the time. Fortunately, Pamela knows what to do from her end and gives her mother's backside a shove. Right in the middle of your father promising your new stepmom that he'll have the doorways widened as soon as possible, the efforts of the four of you pay off and Peggy comes free, stumbling inside and bowling straight into you and your father. She ends up pressing both of you against the opposite wall, an arm around each of you, laughing merrily at the whole thing.

"Well look at this," she says now more or less hugging the pair of you against her massive boobs and gargantuan belly, "now I've got a good hold on both men in my life."

She plants a loud wet kiss on your father's cheek and then one on yours before releasing you (although keeping your father firmly in her arms for a bit of billing and cooing). Ever the gentleman (and not one to leave a lady on the doorstep, pig-lady or not) you go to Pamela and offer a hand to welcome her across the threshold. She blushes a little again, evidently not used to being the center of anyone's attention, but she takes your hand and comes inside, allowing you to close the door.

"Welcome to the family," you say, shaking her hand as you don't really know what else to do.

"Ahem, young man," says Peggy over her shoulder, currently cuddling your father's head pretty much into her bohemoth bosom, "you're quite the gentleman, but no need to be so formal. Family doesn't greet each other like that, so go ahead and give your new stepsister a hug. Go on."

You turn back to Pamela who is blushing even hotter now (which is somehow adorable on her porcine features). You feel for her, being put on the spot and all, and try to put her at her ease with a friendly grin. You spread your comparatively scrawny arms in a welcoming gesture.

"Go on," you say, "bring it in...long as you don't mind, of course."

There's still embarrassment in Pamela's expression...but also a bit of relief. It's as if she expected you to object. Still, given that you don't, she steps into your arms and pretty much surrounds you in a warm and soft embrace, pulling you closer than you expected against her enormous shelf-like bosom and softly domed pot-belly. It's only while you're being hugged that you hear Pamela's voice for the first time.

"Thanks for being so welcoming," she murmurs, her piggy snout practically nuzzling your ear, "I'm...kinda shy. Will you be patient with me?"

"Don't worry about it," you answer just as quietly, "I'll try to make things as easy as they can be."

The releif rises off of Pamela like steam and she gives you another squeeze against her before releasing you. The two of you turn to your father and her mother who are still in each other's arms. Their canoodling is a little embarrassing but you don't particularly mind given that it's obvious they're very much in love. Finally, the two of them turn to the two of you.

"Now," says your father, "I'm pleased to see that everything is in order, and we're going to have to discuss something straight away."

As it turns out, that subject is...
15533221.title: Peggy gets stuck in the door
